text:
Hello Developers :mega: - The Template Marketplace developer docs have been updated.

• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines|HubSpot Template Marketplace Guidelines>
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines/template-marketplace-policies|HubSpot Template Marketplace Policies>
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines/general-requirements|HubSpot Template Marketplace Listing Page Requirements>
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines/theme-requirements|HubSpot Template Marketplace theme requirements>
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines/module-requirements|HubSpot Template Marketplace module requirements>
• <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines/listing-templates|List and update templates in the HubSpot Template Marketplace>
In this larger update, we:
• Removed redundancies
• Added new content (text, video, QAs, etc...) to help clarify and educate
• Reorganized the content within the docs to align with the structure we use for feedback to template providers
Check them out and if you have any questions or concerns please reach out to <mailto:templatereview@HubSpot.com|templatereview@HubSpot.com>, happy coding! :catcoder:
<@UQNEXHW14> at this point it might make sense to get a <@U02094DEMTK> emoji in this slack!
